comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called North American Transit Bus Pictures, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 35740357@N03
comment._content:
Metrobus- We're happy to be added to your group "North American Transit Bus Pictures."  Thanks for asking!

Kristen (U.S. National Archives)
